meanings.definition: A meal that combines breakfast and lunch.
meanings.sent1: On Sundays, my family enjoys a delicious brunch together.
meanings.sent2: I love having brunch because I can eat both breakfast and lunch foods.
meanings.sent3: After missing breakfast, I had a big brunch to make up for it.
meanings.sent4: Brunch is like a tasty blend of morning and midday flavors.
meanings.sent5: The brunch buffet spread out before us was a sight to behold.

meanings.sent1: Let's brunch at that new cafe this weekend.
meanings.sent2: I usually brunch with my friends on Saturdays.
meanings.sent3: She decided to brunch instead of having separate breakfast and lunch.
meanings.sent4: Brunching on the patio felt like a luxurious treat.
meanings.sent5: Brunching together always brings us closer as a group.
